articles.description: There’s a big, big clash locked in for St Kilda’s opening match of the 2021 Season against GWS.
articles.content:
Theres a big, big clash locked in for St Kildas opening match of the 2021 Season, with Brett Rattens side set to lock horns with GWS on Sunday 21 March at GIANTS Stadium.
